channel.title: Connecting Redash to Snowflake PrivateLink URLs
channel.description:
Has anyone tried to create a redash data source connecting to Snowflake, using a non-standard account structure/URL? E.g. Snowflake PrivateLink. Looking for pointers on this, but didn't see any tech notes, forum posts or similar.
Thank you!
